recipe.title: Mustard-Baked Chicken
ingredients: 2 whole pasture-raised chicken legs, thighs, and drumsticks separated
instructions: In a large bowl, toss all the ingredients together and allow the chicken to marinate for 15 minutes in the refrigerator. Transfer the chicken to a baking dish and spoon any excess marinade over it. Bake for 20 to 30 minutes, or until a nice brown crust forms on top of the meat. Serve warm.
